SamPy.astronomy.ACSPhotometry.useSextractor

SamPy.astronomy.ACSPhotometryÂ¶

This Python script calculates HST ACS WFC photometry.

The class can be used to run calacs for calibrating the raw data. The class contains also a simple interface for SExtractor that can be used to find locations of stars in the image.

depends:PyRAF
author:Sami-Matias Niemi, for STScI
history:02/10/09 Initial Version
version:1.0

Functions

useSextractor(input) Very simple interface for running sextractor for given image.

Classes

ACSPhotometry(path, out) A class to do ACS photometry.
